channel.title: Posts on Daminha Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Daminha Blog

item.title: Understanding Zero Knowledge Proofs: Key Concepts and Applications
item.description: This blog explores the fundamentals of Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKPs), an essential concept for understanding security and privacy in ZK-EVM (Zero-Knowledge Ethereum Virtual Machine).

item.title: Extracting IP Addresses via Chat Apps: Zalo and Telegram
item.description: In this blog post, I explore how cybercriminals exploit chat applications like Zalo and Telegram to extract users’ IP addresses through methods like URL spoofing and phishing. By creating and distributing spoofed URLs, attackers can deceive users into revealing sensitive information. I also highlight a specific vulnerability in Telegram that exposes user IP addresses during calls. Learn the mechanics of these attacks, see a detailed proof of concept, and discover essential tips to protect your privacy online.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I am Dang Duong Minh Nhat, a passionate mathematics student with a strong interest in cybersecurity.
